Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardUpdated on 20 Mar 2019Yourself.Because you are the vessel of whatever you do in life. This can be investing in your health, your relationships, your knowledge, your hard work.To put that in perspective:
“The graveyard is the richest place on earth, because it is here that you will find all the hopes and dreams that were never fulfilled, the books that were never written, the songs that were never sung, the inventions that were never shared, the cures that were never discovered, all because someone was too afraid to take that first step, keep with the problem, or determined to carry out their dream.”― Les Brown0 comments0

Prakash KumaraswamiLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 07 Mar 2019Depends on what you see as risk and returns.Invest in yourself involves risk but in long term relatively stable returnsInvest in market capital risk but returns in medium to longer term not as lucrative as option 1Invest in bonds less risk lower returns than above two.Invest in CPF least risk 4% return encashed after 55 (provided you have  retirement sum).0 comments0
